timeline.bodyText: Fix the getElements() method: the list should not be modifiable, except using addElement and removeElement
timeline.author: mathbagu

timeline.bodyText: Make this method public so I could use it. I thought we agreed that the name was not well chosen
timeline.author: mathbagu

timeline.bodyText: Call the new method instead of duplicating its implementation
timeline.author: mathbagu

timeline.message:
Contingency.setId removed, Contingency.addElement/removeElement added, Contingency.checkValidy moved to ContingencyList

Signed-off-by: Thomas ADAM <tadam@silicom.fr>

Taking into account PR review
